desc: The Peak Posture™ Smart Corrector is the #1 posture corrector on the market. Lightweight, comfortable, discreet, and effective. No straps OR velcro. It uses Bluetooth technology to detect a variation in proper posture which triggers a vibration reminder to straighten your back.

layout.text:
The Peak Posture™ Smart Corrector:

Comfortable and discreet. No straps or velcro.
Just a gentle, vibrating reminder
to correct your posture.

The most comfortable
posture corrector
in the world.
